data.eml:eml: Two new species of Oxytrechus Jeannel, 1927 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechini) from Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Delgado, Pedro, Ruiz-Tapiador, Ildefonso (2019): Two new species of Oxytrechus Jeannel, 1927 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechini) from Peru. Zootaxa 4565 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4565.1.6
